meanings.sent1: She had a sufficient amount of food for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He made sure to bring sufficient supplies for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a sufficient amount of acorns to last through winter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a sufficient reward for his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was not sufficient; the students were still confused.

meanings.definition: Capable of meeting the needs or requirements.
meanings.sent1: The new machine is not sufficient for the heavy workload.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to provide a sufficient solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed it was sufficient to catch the red dot on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His determination was sufficient to carry him through the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The umbrella was not sufficient to shield her from the heavy rain.
